thread.title: BRIEF-GuangDong Super Telecom sees FY 2017 net profit down 26.4 pct to 39.6 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GuangDong Super Telecom sees FY 2017 net profit down 26.4 pct to 39.6 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - guangdong super telecom co ltd

text:
Jan 25(Reuters) - GuangDong Super Telecom Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 26.4 percent to 39.6 percent
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 30.3 million yuan
* Says increased expenses and continuous loss in business area of Heilongjiang are the main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/934AcQ
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
